metadata.Description: Online platforms that connect borrowers and lenders directly.

level 1.Description: Peer-to-peer lending platforms implement the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote sustainable energy practices.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to sustainable energy sources.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms focus on supporting the development and adoption of clean energy technologies.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms operate in the energy market to facilitate investments in sustainable energy projects.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms partner with renewable energy startups to provide financial support and resources.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms contribute to improving energy access by supporting projects that provide clean and affordable energy solutions.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms monitor energy consumption patterns to identify opportunities for energy efficiency improvements.
Peer-to-peer lending platforms target the achievement of sustainable development goals through investments in sustainable energy projects.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency employs energy audits to identify energy-saving opportunities and optimize energy use.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy agencies
level 2.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

level 2.Subject: traditional energy technologies
level 2.Description: Traditional energy technologies implement the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of energy-saving designs and materials.

level 2.Subject: traditional energy technologies
level 2.Description: Traditional energy technologies focus on developing clean cooking solutions to reduce indoor air pollution and improve health.

level 2.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 2.Description: Renewable energy certificates contribute to climate change mitigation efforts by promoting the use of clean and sustainable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: energy storage
level 3.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 3.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

subelement_relations.Description: Loan originators are entities that originate loans on peer-to-peer lending platforms. They assess borrower creditworthiness, structure loan agreements, and manage the loan repayment process.
Investors are individuals or institutions that provide funds on peer-to-peer lending platforms. They earn returns based on the interest and principal repayments from borrowers.
Borrowers are individuals or businesses that seek loans on peer-to-peer lending platforms. They can access funds at competitive interest rates and with flexible terms.

Credit scoring models are algorithms used by peer-to-peer lending platforms to assess the creditworthiness of borrowers. These models analyze various data points to determine the likelihood of loan repayment.

Loan agreements are legal contracts between borrowers and investors facilitated by peer-to-peer lending platforms. These agreements outline the terms and conditions of the loan, including interest rates, repayment schedules, and penalties.
